name: I Love BEATBOX Wristbands 3/4"
description:
Do you love beatbox? Whether you are a beatboxer or not, these stylish wristbands are a perfect way to show your support for one of the worlds fastest growing forms of modern art. The dimensions of the sizes available are as follows:

Youth: 1/2" height, 7" (180mm) circumference
Adult: 3/4" height, 8" (202mm) circumference 
Extra Large: 3/4" height, 8.5" (210mm) circumference 

These wristbands are the longest lasting bands available on the market - They are debossed and ink injected, and are made with 100% silicone (does not contain latex). 

Be sure to check out the unboxing video for a full review of the wristbands if you have any unanswered questions (http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9qF4_xOtJnw), and order yours today!

name: Squishy Petri
description: Nothing stocks a stuffing like a squishy pineapple wearing sunglasses! These custom made squishy pineapples look just like Petri but don't make quite a fuss when you drop them. They are made with a unique high quality foam that is dense and will last for years. Here's just a few things they are good for: - Squeezing when you're stressed or excited - Throwing when you're angry - Exercising with when you're bored - Talking to when you're lonely - Taking pictures of when a you're feeling adventerous - Buying while you're here ...and many more! And here's what some fan's would do with their squishy Petri (submitted on the Peterpot fanpage): - Make movies with or of him - Make a life size squishy Petri and have it as a couch buddy - To test the effects of a newly designed parachute by tossing it off the Burj tower in Dubai - I would eat chicken wings with him - Play catch with it - I would watch the office with him - Play halo with it - Put a "swatch" on him and ask what time it is - Sleeping with him - Read a book - Go down a water slide - I would channel surf with him - Posing in the middle of a pile of real pineapples - Sitting in front of a huuuuggee plate of spaghetti - I would knit with him - Aquarium decoration - Being wrapped around by a snake - Posing in a tux - I would have a dance party with him - Going on a rollercoaster - In an old fashioned portrait sitting on someone’s shoulder - Attach it to the dash of my truck - Playing catcher at a baseball game - Playing an iPod touch (any game) - I would bring him to work to brighten up my days - On the bench at a hockey game - Handles for a foosball table - Crowd surfing at a rock concert - Dog Toy - Car antenna topper - Target Practice - Use him as a bath toy - Key chain - Put him on the top of an umbrella - Pencil topper - Include in one of my videos and in doing so I'd be giving a shout out to Peterpot - He would look good on my desk at work - Gym buddy - Going on a date with - Being your friend - You can love it ♥ - A decorative addition to my room - As a rival - Stunt double - I would take him to fish creek and take pictures with him in the fall - A co-worker - Play ps3 with Eazy-G knockin heads in the COD (Call of Duty) world - They'd look great in a bucket of Corona - Cover for the hole on a pop can so that bugs don't get in - A topper for a Christmas tree - Hand exercise ball - Decoration - HAVE FUN!

name: Petri T-shirt (Black)
description:
Nothing says 'style' better than the worlds most popular and fashionable fruit wearing sunglasses. If you enjoy looking good and feeling great, than this is the shirt for you.

These stylish 50/50 American Apparel shirts are made with 50% cotton and 50% polyester and are one of the softest and most comfortable shirts you'll ever wear.

name: Petri T-shirt (White)
description:
Nothing says 'style' better than the worlds most popular and fashionable fruit wearing sunglasses. If you enjoy looking good and feeling great, than this is the shirt for you.

These stylish 50/50 American Apparel shirts are made with 50% cotton and 50% polyester and are one of the softest and most comfortable shirts you'll ever wear.

name: Peterpot T-shirt (Grey)
description:
Now you can turn heads without having to whistle quietly! These stylish American Apparel shirts are made with 100% cotton and feel so cool you'll swear you're beatboxing. 

**Shirts will shrink slighty if washed in hot water. If you are not sure which size would fit you best, please order the next size larger. 

**All shirts are unisex unless otherwise noted

name: Squishy Petri Hat - Reggae
description:
What's cooler than a pineapple wearing sunglasses? Why a pineapple wearing sunglasses AND and reggae hat of course! 

Each hat is carefully handmade and custom fit to rest on the head of your squishy Petri. The hat can also be used for anything else you can think of - you could use it as a sleeping bag for your squishy Petri on a cold night, or hold it upside down as you wait for the bus to earn a bit of extra money panhandling.

The Reggae hat is the first product in the Squishy Petri fashion line and only available in very limted quantities, so make sure you buy one of these limited edition items before they are sold out!

name: Peterpot Sticker
description: These high quality decals are printed on an 8 mil vinyl stock and will last up to 3 years outdoors or onstage. They look great on remotes, speakers, amps, binders, doors, poster boards, skateboards, snowboards, helmets, postcards, ipods, microphones, and pretty much any where else.

name: Peterpot Buttons
description:
These 1" high quality buttons look great on practically everything. Pin one to your backpack, hoodie, lunch kit, sleeping bag, or purse and show the world why Petri is your favorite fruit. 

Or, if you only like to wear the buttons on special occasions, we have that covered as well. Each of the 5 different colored backings make a perfect place to store your buttons when they're not in action.
